articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Tree Nursery of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Tree Nursery of KPA
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), provided field guidance to the Tree Nursery No. 122 of the KPA successfully built as a gift of loyalty to be presented by the KPA to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					 Noting that he planned to turn the tree nursery into the one to be proud of in the world so that it might be presented as a gift to the Seventh Congress of the WPK, he said with great satisfaction that the KPA has creditably carried out the order of the supreme commander without an inch of deflection.
					
					 The tree nursery looks very vast as it is full of architectural structures and it has undergone so dramatic changes that no trace of its appearance last year could be found, he said, adding with pleasure that a model, standard of the tree nursery in the country and the tree nursery, the first of its kind, has been wonderfully built.
					
					 He went round various places of the tree nursery.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that a combined control system has been successfully built at the tree nursery to ensure the most suitable conditions and environment for cultivating tree saplings.
					
					 He said that sapling greenhouses have bee built in a modern way to optimize the conditions for the growth of saplings by introducing cutting-edge technology and it is possible to produce saplings twice for a year by realizing the automation and mechanization of work in the greenhouses on a high level.
					
					 Modern irrigation facilities and sunshade apparatuses have been installed at the cultivation grounds for acclimatizing saplings grown on the round cuttings grounds and greenhouses to outdoor environment and at the districts for cultivating potted saplings, he said, noting they look attractive.
					
					 He said that all production processes ranging from the seed selection to sowing and sapling packing have been automated and streamlined and there are adequate stroma production processes and facilities for storing saplings.
					
					 The yearly sapling production at the tree nursery is more than 20 million and if all provinces build such land-saving and manpower-saving tree nurseries as this tree nursery, they will be able to produce 0.2 billion saplings a year, he said with satisfaction. He called upon the chairmen of the provincial party committees and officials concerned to visit the tree nursery.
					
					 He gave thanks to the designing unit, construction unit and the scientific research field that contributed to building the tree nursery of the world level to be handed to posterity in the name of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the Tree Nursery No. 122 of the KPA would manage and operate the tree nursery in a responsible manner and thus creditably discharge their mission and duty in turning all mountains of the country into mountains of gold and treasures.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Jun, minister of Land and Environment Protection, and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the National Defence Commission.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from G. A. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on May 10.
					 The message said:
					
					 I send my heartfelt congratulations to you on your election as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 I express belief that the WPK will invariably lead the Korean people's building of a thriving socialist society under your guidance.
					
					 I wish you great successes in your creative work for the country and people's well-being.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Hailed in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Hailed in Britain
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting for congratulating supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was held in Britain on May 10.
					 Speeches were made after the decision of the WPK Seventh Congress on electing the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to the top post of the WPK was read out there.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), said that Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader who has led to victory the Korean revolution with his outstanding ideology and rare wisdom, adding:
					
					 Under his guidance, signal successes have been achieved for the past years in the DPRK and Korea's prestige and power have reached the highest level.
					
					 His election as chairman of the WPK made it possible to guarantee the eternal victory of the WPK.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said that the British followers of the Juche idea and Songun idea warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Cape Verde
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Cape Verde
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Ulisses Correia Silva upon his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Cape Verde on May 13.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the country's development and prosperity, expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Director General of Peruvian Newspaper El Callao Here
articles.content:
Director General of Peruvian Newspaper El Callao Here
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Abraham Ramirez Lituma, director general and editor-in-chief of the Peruvian newspaper El Callao, arrived here Sunday.

articles.title: Peruvian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Peruvian Delegation Here
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers headed by executive member Leopoldo Ortiz Centty, general secretary of the Port Trade Union, arrived here Sunday by train.

articles.title: Seventh Congress of WPK Celebrated in South Hwanghae Province, Nampho City
articles.content:
Seventh Congress of WPK Celebrated in South Hwanghae Province, Nampho City
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in South Hwanghae Province and Nampho City on Sunday to celebrate the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were officials, working people, youth and students of the party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities in the province and city.
					
					 Speakers said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK was a political event to be specially recorded in the history of the WPK and the country.
					
					 The report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the WPK made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at its Seventh Congress serves as the great programme ushering in a bright future of the socialist power and as a military banner powerfully encouraging all the service personnel and people to the general charge, the speakers noted.
					
					 They underlined the need to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche forever, implement their behests to the last and remain loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called upon the officials and working people of all units to more dynamically effect production surge and positively contribute to building an economic giant and improving the people's living standard in the same spirit and stamina as was performed when performing new miracles and feats during the 70-day campaign.
					
					 They also called upon all people to hold high the banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, bear deep in mind the pride and self-confidence with which they glorified the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the revolutionary great auspicious event and dynamically launch the drive for the increased production, creation and uninterrupted offensive. 
					
					 Then there were mass demonstrations.

articles.title: 5,000-ton Trade Cargo Ship Launched
articles.content:
5,000-ton Trade Cargo Ship Launched
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- 5,000-ton trade cargo ship "Jaryok" (self-reliance) was built as a present to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The ship was launched with due ceremony at the Ryongnam Dockyard on Sunday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials concerned, officials and employees of the dockyard.
					
					 Kang Jong Gwan, minister of Land and Maritime Transport, made an address for the launch to be followed by some speeches.
					
					 They said the present success is ascribable to the patriotic devotion of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to the development of maritime trade and to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and it is also a proof of the loyalty of the working people and officials in the maritime transport field to the party who are determined to bring in earlier the final victory of building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un personally named the cargo ship "Jaryok".
					
					 The loving care and trust of Kim Jong Un is associated with the intention wanting to dynamically promoting the development of the maritime industry in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, they noted.
					
					 They called for attaining the high goal for the development of maritime industry by displaying the revolutionary spirit and mettle of heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in close unity around Kim Jong Un and dynamically fighting for the final victory of building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 A tape was cut and the cargo ship slid off the launching ways to the sea.

articles.title: Japanese Militarists' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Militarists' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Assailed
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, incumbent Japanese Cabinet ministers and at least 90 dietmen belonging to the "Association of Dietmen for Visiting Yasukuni Shrine", ultra-rightist organization, flocked to Yasukuni Shrine to burn incense and call back the departed soul of militarism.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that the aim sought by the Japanese politicians in visiting the shrine is to paint the war criminals as "patriots" and create a social atmosphere of reinvasion by instilling the militarist idea into the Japanese people, not the guilty conscience about the past history.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are trying to bring back the days when they invaded Asia at will while trumpeting about the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" in the past century while grinding the poisonous teeth for reinvasion.
					
					 So they have removed bothersome legal and institutional mechanism that may be obstacles in launching overseas invasion one by one by employing this or that way from long ago.
					
					 It admits of no argument that the Japanese reactionaries' visit to the shrine and development of military equipment stem from their criminal aim at reinvasion.
					
					 Japan's reinvasion of Asia is just a matter of time. Its first target is the DPRK. Japan tries to invade the DPRK just as it did in past century and advance toward the continent with the DPRK as stepping-stone.
					
					 But Japan is mistaken.
					
					 The DPRK has powerful military capabilities enough for repelling any aggression at one blow. If Japanese reactionaries dare invade the DPRK misjudging the reality, the army of the DPRK will blast the stronghold of invasion, Japan, in a moment.
					
					 The DPRK warns once again. Reinvasion will just lead Japan to ruin.

articles.title: KCNA Issues Detailed Report on Conclusion of WPK Seventh Congress as Glorious One of Victory
articles.content:
KCNA Issues Detailed Report on Conclusion of WPK Seventh Congress as Glorious One of Victory
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency on Saturday issued a detailed report as regards that the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) attained its goal thanks to the loyalty and trust of all the party members, servicepersons and people and was concluded as the congress of victory and glory.
					 According to the detailed report, the WPK Seventh Congress, at which the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK and a great programme was laid down for the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution, was the most significant, great assembly marking the watershed in the struggle to accomplish the great cause of Paektu under the banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The shining victory of the Seventh Congress of the WPK is the brilliant fruition of the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On October 30, Juche 104 (2015) the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK decided to convene the Seventh Congress in reflection of the requirements of the party and the developing revolution.
					
					 Upon hearing the decision of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, the servicepersons and people rose up as one toward May of victory, burning their hearts with the fever to make a revolution and fight to glorify the Seventh Congress as the greatest heyday of the revolution.
					
					 The whole party, the entire army and all the people turned out in the 70-day campaign of loyalty in response to the appeal of the WPK Central Committee to greet the Seventh Congress with the greatest successes and highest labor feats after the joint calls of the Party Central Committee and the Party Central Military Commission and a letter of the Party Central Committee to all the party members were made public in February, 2016 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress.
					
					 Model units for general charge were created in the major fronts including electric power, coal, metallurgical and machine building industries, light industry, agriculture, construction, scientific research and sports fields and the movements for overtaking others, learning from others and exchanging experience were conducted in every part of the country and, as a result, the successes to be presented as gifts to the Seventh Congress were recorded in the pages of the 70-day campaign books.
					
					 Provincial, city and county party conferences took place in the run-up to the Seventh Congress.
					
					 The conference of the Korean People's Army of the WPK held on April 12 and 13 elected the respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress.
					
					 Decisions on electing Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress were adopted at all provincial party conferences with a unanimous approval.
					
					 All the provincial party conferences reviewed their work done since the Sixth Congress, elected new leadership organs and elected and nominated officials and party members as delegates and observers to the Seventh Congress.
					
					 A decision of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee on holding the Seventh Congress in Pyongyang on May 6 was released.
					
					 The participants of the congress arrived here on May 2 with the successes achieved in the 70-day campaign.
					
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them. They also visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where the great leaders lie in state, and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Senior party and state officials and officials of the party and armed forces organs visited the lodging quarters of the participants to congratulate them.
					
					 A national photo exhibition and a national art exhibition for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the WPK were opened here.
					
					 On the occasion of the Seventh Congress, Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters, floral baskets, gifts, medals, titles of honor and diplomas from foreign party and state leaders, political parties, organizations, organizations for the study of the Juche idea, personages of various circles and the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps, the economic and commercial councilors corps, diplomatic envoys and the missions of the international organizations here.
					
					 Congratulatory messages, letters and floral baskets were sent to the Party Congress and the WPK Central Committee by foreign political parties, party leaders, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea and personages of various circles.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK was opened with splendor on May 6.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made an opening address.
					
					 All the participants of the congress observed a moment's silence in memory of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, patriotic martyrs, officials, working people and pro-reunification patriotic figures at the suggestion of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The congress elected Kim Jong Un to its presidium.
					
					 Congratulatory messages of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China to Kim Jong Un were read out and silk banners politely presented to him.
					
					 The congress introduced the fact that the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front sent a congratulatory message and silk banner and the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party and the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party sent congratulatory messages and silk banners to the congress.
					
					 The congress sent congratulatory messages to the service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and to the working people and officials of the institutions, industrial establishments and cooperative farms.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a report on the review of the work of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Speeches were made to thoroughly implement the important tasks set forth in his report.
					
					 He indicated the issues arising in carrying out the tasks set forth in his report on the review of the work of the C.C., the WPK in his conclusion made at the third-day sitting of the Party Congress, setting forth to the party, the army and the people of the DPRK the fighting slogan "Let the whole Party, the entire army and all the people go all out for the implementation of the tasks advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea to hasten the final victory of the Juche revolution!"
					
					 A congratulatory message to the Seventh Congress of the WPK from all the service personnel and people was read out at the congress and a decision on "Review of the Work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" wad adopted with the approval of all delegates.
					
					 The congratulatory groups of the Korean Children's Union and the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League presented floral baskets to Kim Jong Un and read out their congratulatory messages.
					
					 The congress adopted a decision on revising "The Rules of the Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					 The congress elected Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK on May 9.
					
					  It declared that Kim Jong Un was elected member of the Party Central Committee, member of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee and chairman of the Party Central Military Commission according to the rules of the WPK and the rules of the election of the supreme leadership organ of the WPK.
					
					 The 1st Plenary Meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the WPK elected the Presidium of the Political Bureau and the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and organized its Executive Policy Council and the WPK Central Military Commission headed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Published at the congress was an appeal of the Seventh Congress of the WPK to all the service personnel, young people and other people "Make an all-out charge for the complete victory of socialism by launching the Mallima speed campaign!"
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a closing address at the congress.
					
					 The congress set forth the high target and fighting programme for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Pyongyang city mass rally and public procession and the torchlight procession of the young vanguard took pace at Kim Il Sung Square on May 10 and a joint performance "Following Our Party Forever" was given by the Moranbong Band, the Chongbong Band and the State Merited Chorus on May 11 to celebrate the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the participants in the congress.
					
					 Banquets were given at the Mokran House, the People's Palace of Culture, Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, the Pyongyang Noodle House, Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, Yanggakdo International Hotel, Full-service Ship Mujigae and Restaurant Boat Taedonggang.
					
					 During the congress the participants visited Mangyongdae (the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung), the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War, the Youth Movement Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc. and looked round the exhibition of machinery and equipment manufactured as labor gifts of loyalty to be presented to the congress.
					
					 There took place a workshop for the participants in the congress.
					
					 They held a meeting for adopting a letter pledge to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Will of WPK for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Will of WPK for Independent Reunification
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- It is the firm will and determination of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to the letter and achieve a final victory of independent reunification of the country, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Reunification of Korea is the biggest long-cherished desire and urgent task of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Juche-oriented line of the WPK for national reunification is manifested in a comprehensive way in the three charters of national reunification clarified by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The three charters of national reunification serve as perfect guideline which give clear clarification to all the principled issues and ways to achieve national reunification as desired and required by all Koreans.
					
					 The Koreans should pave the way to the reunification guided by the three charters of national reunification whose vitality has been proven in practice.
					
					 Hurdles and difficulties still lie in the way of national reunification as before, but the independent reunification of Korea is sure to be achieved under the leadership of the invincible WPK which is carrying forward the ideas and desires of the great leaders, while giving continuity to the history of national independence.
					
					 If Korea is reunified, it will emerge as a world power with the population of 80 million, an advanced and highly civilized country keeping up with the world trend and a power of justice taking the lead in protecting the peace in Northeast Asia and other parts of the world.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities Intensify Arms Buildup
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Authorities Intensify Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military authorities are mulling additionally deploying at least 100 latest tanks in the front area, according to the south Korean KBS on May 12.
					 The military authorities say that at the end of last year they decided to additionally produce tanks for their deployment in the front area, while touting "qualitative superiority over the north's mechanized forces."
					
					 Their moves for arms buildup arouse great concern at home and abroad as they are dangerous reckless moves aggravating the situation and increasing the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Blame Authorities for Imposing Heavy Taxes on People
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Blame Authorities for Imposing Heavy Taxes on People
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are collecting more taxes from the people, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the taxes collected by the authorities in the first quarter this year amounted to 64 trillion won or 13. 8 trillion won more than those of the same period last year. 
					
					 The authorities imposed heavy taxes though small and medium-sized companies suffered from depression, the media censured.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Policy against Labor under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Policy against Labor under Fire
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a joint press conference at the hall of the Federation on May 10 and declared that they would struggle against the anti-labor policy of the authorities, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The organizations said that the "government" moves to trample down the workers' right to existence.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Measure Concerning Environment Pollution under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Measure Concerning Environment Pollution under Fire
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS condemned the authorities' farce of taking measures against the environment pollution.
					 It said that the regime spent tremendous amount of money allegedly to reduce the environment pollution but more dust is seen in the air.
					
					 Although it spent three trillion won under the signboard of taking measures against the environment pollution, the regime tries to mislead the public by such description that the pollution in the capital area greatly reduced, while taking any measure.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Crimes Should Be Called into Question: DPRK FM Spokesman
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Crimes Should Be Called into Question: DPRK FM Spokesman
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards the unsettled case of the allurement and abduction of a group of the DPRK's citizens by the south Korean authorities:
					 As known, the south Korean authorities, engrossed with the smear campaign against the DPRK, let the gangsters of the Intelligence Service commit the heinous terrorist act of alluring and abducting the DPRK's women citizens in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China in broad daylight in early April to south Korea.
					
					 This is a violent infringement upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, unpardonable grave political provocation inciting confrontation and tension between the north and the south and unprecedented heinous crime mercilessly abusing the human rights of the DPRK's citizens.
					
					 As soon as the case occurred, the DPRK strongly demanded the south Korean authorities unconditionally send back the abductees of the DPRK without delay and take a practical measure at once for helping the parents of the abductees go to Seoul and meet their daughters face to face while bitterly denouncing the brutal act of the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities did not permit the elementary humanitarian demand of the parents but are talking about "voluntary defection from the north" while keeping the abductees in solitary cells and keeping them away from media.
					
					 Their inhumane behavior is the unethical crime denying even the most elementary rights regulated in the World Declaration of Human Rights and relevant international conventions on human rights.
					
					 The reality fully proves that the south Korean authorities are the chief criminals of human rights abuses and group of traitors without an equal in the world as they are keeping the DPRK's citizens in custody against their will, far from responding to the DPRK's magnanimous steps of good faith for improving the north-south relations published at the historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. and the West are keeping mum about south Korea's institutional human rights abuses such as the heinous group allurement and abduction though they have groundlessly taken issue with other countries over their human rights whether they are true or false, while touting the "protection and promotion of human rights".
					
					 The families of the abductees sent the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights and the president of the United Nations Human Rights Council the letters of indicting the south Korean authorities for their criminal act and demanding an immediate step.
					
					 The UN and the international human rights organizations should bear in mind how they deal with this case will be a touchstone discerning the truth about "protection and promotion of human rights" touted by them, call into question the south Korean authorities' unethical crime and take a relevant step to send the abductees of the DPRK back to the folds of their family members as soon as possible.

articles.title: Korean in China Highly Praises Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Korean in China Highly Praises Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The election of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the greatest fortune for all the Korean people and great auspicious event in the history of the nation.
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China who is heading the congratulatory group of the association for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the WPK, said this when he was interviewed by KCNA on May 15.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 I can never forget the day when I had the greatest fortune of reading out the congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un and presenting him with a congratulatory banner at the platform of the Party Congress.
					
					 I was very excited when I looked up to the image of the benevolent and kind-hearted leader full of energy. Listening to his resounding voice, I felt great strength surging up in me.
					
					 He unrolled a grandiose design for achieving a final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 When I recall the report made at the congress line by line, I feel like the rosy future of the reunified homeland which is just ahead, homeland which would demonstrate its dignity and might as a world-level power possessed of tremendous national power and an advanced and highly civilized nation which goes ahead of the world with strong spirit and bravery and outstanding wisdom of the nation.
					
					 Our fellow countrymen are really the most proud nation in the world as they are led by the distinguished leader.
					
					 We will further consolidate the General Association of Koreans in China into the Kim Jong Un's overseas citizens organization by keeping pace with the people in the homeland making a dynamic advance to carry out the tasks set forth at the Party Congress.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Welcome Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Welcome Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on May 10 to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at the its Seventh Congress.
					
					 It went on: His election is a historic event which is of great significance.
					
					 This also shows the boundless trust and respect of all the Korean party members, service personnel and people for him.
					
					 The Korean people have waged a dynamic struggle to implement the instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership.
					
					 And they succeeded in H-bomb test, thus further bolstering the invincible military capabilities as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Now that they hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the chairman of the WPK, they are sure to achieve the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Belgian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Belgian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A Belgian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Brussels some days ago.
					 The chairman of the Belgium-Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events in praise of the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the above-said meeting.

articles.title: Ukrainian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Ukrainian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- An Ukrainian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Kiev some days ago.
					 Gennadi Berdishev, professor and doctor at Kiev University, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events in praise of the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the important days next year such as the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Ugandan Body Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Abducting DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Ugandan Body Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Abducting DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities should immediately send the DPRK's citizens, who were allured and abducted to south Korea in group, back to their country in the light of international law and humanitarianism.
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement urged this in a statement on May 9.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 We can not repress the indignation at the south Korean authorities' group allurement and abduction of the DPRK citizens.
					
					 The gangs of the Intelligence Service of south Korea deserve to be denounced by the world conscience and progressive mankind as they committed the hideous crime apparently in violation of justice and human rights.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's just demand for the repatriation of the abducted citizens to the folds of their beloved family members.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Myanmar
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was published in booklet by a publishing house of Myanmar with due ceremony on May 9 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending their idea and exploits and glorifying them for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige labor de almaciga No.122 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige labor de almaciga No.122 de EPC
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la almaciga No.122 del EPC, construida magnificamente por los militares como regalo dedicado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					Mostro gran satisfaccion diciendo que el ejercito popular cumplio con absoluta perfeccion la orden del Comandante Supremo de acondicionarlo como almaciga de talla mundial para prepararlo como regalo al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Diciendo que es muy grande la almaciga, se formo un grupo arquitectonico, se cambio tan radicalmente su fisonomia y no puede encontrarse con el aspecto del ano pasado, subrayo con alegria que se levanto excelentemente el ejemplar y estandar de la almaciga de nuestro pais y la primera fabrica de cultivo de arboles en el vivero.
					
					Recorrio varios lugares de la almaciga.
					
					Mostro una gran satisfaccion por haber establecido el sistema combinado de control de la almaciga para asegurar las condiciones y el ambiente mas adecuados al cultivo de las posturas de arbol.
					
					Senalo que no solo construyeron de manera moderna los invernaderos de posturas para crear al maximo las condiciones de crecimiento de las posturas aplicando las tecnicas de punta, sino tambien realizaron en el nivel alto la automatizacion y la mecanizacion de las labores de invernadero permitiendo asi producir en dos veces al ano las posturas.
					
					Apunto que son dignos de ver las modernas instalaciones de irrigacion y la sombrilla instaladas en el campo circular de plantacion de esqueje, el otro de cultivo para adaptar en el aire las posturas criadas en el invernadero y las zonas de cultivo de posturas en vasija.
					
					Destaco que se realizan de manera automatica y en cadena todos los procesos de produccion desde la seleccion de semilla, la siembra hasta el embalaje de posturas y son perfectos el proceso de produccion de sustrato y las instalaciones de deposito de posturas.
					
					Esta almaciga tiene la cantidad de produccion anual de mas de 20 millones y se pueden producir al ano 200 millones de posturas si se construyen en todas las provincias las almacigas con poco territorio y poca mano de obra similares con este semillero, dijo y enfatizo que deben visitar aqui los presidentes de los Comites Provinciales del PTC y otros funcionarios de las ramas interesadas.
					
					Dio agradecimiento en nombre del VII Congreso del PTC a las unidades del diseno, la construccion y la investigacion cientifica que hicieron aporte a la construccion de la almaciga de talla mundial a ser heredada a las generaciones venideras.
					
					Expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la almaciga haran con responsabilidad la administracion y gestion de la almaciga y cumpliran su mision y deber asumidos en el trabajo para convertir todos los montes del pais en los de oro y tesoro.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el vicepresidente del CC del PTC, O Su Yong, el subjefe del departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won, el ministro de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental, Kim Kyong Jun, y el director de Departamento de Diseno del CDN, Ma Won Chun.
